name: Pierrot's Plot
description:
Pierrot's Plot is a single player action command rhythm game in the vein of Rhythm Heaven.

In this game the player must continually press the keys that appear on their screen in order to keep their "crowd" meter up. if their meter lowers too much, "Pierrot's plot" will be revealed. 

(The fact that you are the true musician playing the instrument from a hidden position while he noodles his fingers to make it appear as if he is playing the melody).

The player will go from Easy Normal and Hard difficulties of 3 songs (all piano)

Each song will range from a different amount of possible button inputs (alphabet) example: 

Easy = 8 possible buttons

Normal = 16 Possible buttons and arrow keys

Hard = all 26 buttons and arrow keys (possibly space bar implementation in the future)

More Instruments, songs, models and possibly even difficulties to come in the future when my schedule allows me to do so. 

Last but not least. Enjoy the game!!!
